Name: Gin Fixed
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of quarter lemon slice wheel.
STRAIN into glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice.
CHURN and add more crushed ice so the cocktail fills the glass.
Garnish with lemon slice on rim.
Review: Sweet and sour with a spirity pineapple twang.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Fixed contains 192 calories
